TopicTitle: SpaceX Pack opening rockets not working

Articles.Content:
Hi
I downloaded the SPaceX pack from Spacedock, and everything is fine for me, except the function of opening saved ships. I see in a YouTube tutorial that there are ships that can be opened directly mounted, but I do not get that function. I would like to try the ITS but because of the size, I cannot put the motors.
Greetings and thanks in advance
